title: NA LCS Summer Finals Survival Guide

replies.body: will alcohol be available for sale
Yep, Air Canada Centre will be serving alcohol :)
Will there be merchandise for sale at NA LCS Finals?
Yeah I also want to know
I need to know as well!!
TSM! TSM! TSM!

Question, what would happen if CLG beat IMT and TSM lost to C9? Like TSM and CLG would tie in points sooo who would take 2nd seed? I mean I haven't heard any of the casters talk about this in detail and I can't find a post about it so I just assume the higher placed team takes it?

TSM would make it in, as Summer Split points are weighted more than Spring Split. Therefore, TSM has automatically qualified for Worlds, they are playing for either 1st or 2nd seed. If TSM wins, CLG automatically qualifies for Worlds as the 2nd place seed. If C9 wins, TSM will be 2nd place seed.
Hope this helps.
TSM won the tiebreaker, never lost a best of 3 or 5 match against CLG this split which means in the event of a tie TSM would retain the higher seeding.
That's sad. The real problem with TSM has always been their biggest problem, fanboys. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I am not sure how that is sad.....That rule is consistent throughout all types of sports. And I am not sure how a team having fans is a problem...
Will there be meet and greets after or before the match?
Is there???
Are we allowed to bring a small strap gym bag ( the drawstring type just to hold small belongings)

u cant beat me doe {{champion:38}}

Welcome to Toronto. Enjoy our great selection of bars and clubs. Stay away from heroine alley though. 

Our Kush is alright but its nothing compared to the Cali products

And have fun I like to think we're super friendly people. If your lodt or whatever just ask anyone on the street for aid.

Im super jealous I couldnt get any tickets in the first ten minutes, but i hope you guys enjoy my city and the LCS!
That's a legit Syndra cosplay.
Here come dat Syndra
TSM! TSM! TSM!

Hello! My sister and I found a bag of merchandise on the floor near the Booster Juice in the 25 YORK ST. building after the 3rd/4th place match yesterday. 

We waited for about 15 mins hoping that the owner would return but they did not. If you are the owner, you can send me an email at: babyninja@live.ca

The bag has specific contents and a receipt. I am hoping to identify the owner by receiving specific information of the receipt or the exact contents. 

I'm certain you feel bummed about losing this bag, as would I. 

I hope I can find you and return your goodies. :( 

I would appreciate anyone who shares this info! Thank you!
Ah yes, my favorite team, Team Eny. (Small typo lol)
